attributes.action: Set up a Paramilitary National Police Force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The police are stretched to breaking point. Some inner cities have become no-go areas, where decent people fear to tread after dark - and sometimes during the day.

We need a National Para-Military Police Force, under the direct control of the Home Secretary, to protect both civilians AND our out-numbered, out-gunned police force.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
